title: This reusable smart notebook is a visual learner's dream tool
description: The Rocketbook Pro is an inexpensive and eco-friendly way to digitize handwritten notes, but is it compelling enough to replace your planner or bullet journal?

title: I found the ultimate 'for enthusiasts' phone in the most unexpected way
description: The Asus ROG Phone 7 Ultimate is as feature-packed as the name suggests. But a few hidden gems make it worth considering even if you're not a gamer at heart.

title: Logitech's Project Ghost draws on old camera tricks for better video meetings today
description: In partnership with Steelcase, Logitech's Project Ghost chases Google's Starline aspirations with accessible hardware and a movie-making classic.
